column4: hi everyone, does Ubuntu 11.10 allow to install gnome-shell without dependency problems?
My understanding is yes... but you might want to wait for someone who's actually tried it to report back!
i tried with 11.10 beta 2 and daily builds couple of days ago and there was no way to install gnome-shell, many dependencies were unsolvable
I would be surprised if that's not been resolved before release.
